scripts.bump: npm install --legacy-peer-deps $(cat package.json | jq -r '((.dependencies, .devDependencies) | keys) - (.skipBump | keys) | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}') && npm audit fix || exit 0
scripts.postbump: cat package.json | jq '. + (.dependencies = (.dependencies + ((.localPeers // []) | map({ key: ., value: "0.0.0-0" }) | from_entries) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries))' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json
scripts.prebump: cat package.json | jq '((.localPeers // []) | map(["dependencies", .])) as $localPeersPaths | delpaths($localPeersPaths)' > package-temp.json && cp package-temp.json package.json
